review_title: A headache not worth the hourly wage
job_title: Clinic Services Representative in Portland, OR
pros: Co-workers were generally nice. There were some discounts for treatments and you have the ability to schedule yourself in with your chosen providers. Sometimes there was free food.
cons: Consistently understaffed. Patients were temperamental and frustrated by waits in line and being put on hold on the phone and took it out on reception - but this was always because there weren't enough people working. Co-workers called in a lot and no one was available to fill in for them. Some days the phone rang off the hook (to the point where I would still be hearing it when I went home) with only one other person behind the desk, yet enough seating for four employees. Was asked on multiple occasions to cover or switch shifts last minute. "Training" was a joke, put into shadow whoever was working on a given day and all of them instructed me to do things differently.
